docs.snippet: An adequate national defense is the best guarantee any country can have against aggression, Major Gen. Pedro Aurelio de Goes Monteiro, Chief of Staff of the Army of Brazil and head of the Brazilian military mission to the United States, said...
docs.lead_paragraph: An adequate national defense is the best guarantee any country can have against aggression, Major Gen. Pedro Aurelio de Goes Monteiro, Chief of Staff of the Army of Brazil and head of the Brazilian military mission to the United States, said yesterday in an interview at the Hotel Ambassador.

docs.snippet: The cultural, economic and geographical ties linking Brazil and the United States were hailed yesterday by Richard W. Lawrence, president of the Chamber of Commerce of the State of New York, as examples of "how nations at peace may cooperate to...
docs.lead_paragraph: The cultural, economic and geographical ties linking Brazil and the United States were hailed yesterday by Richard W. Lawrence, president of the Chamber of Commerce of the State of New York, as examples of "how nations at peace may cooperate to mutual advancement."

docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 15, --Future relations between the new regime in Spain and the South American republics will depend largely upon General Francisco Franco's reaction to the conference that opens here next Tuesday to celebrate the fiftieth anniversary of the Congress of Montevideo, which ...
